Interestingly if Muslims were to take part in a show called "Make Me a Christian" they would recieve countless death threats and possibly be killed. Horrible propaganda for the worlds most inhumane "religion." Shame on British TV for tricking people into this blood cult.

BBC has admitted many times they lean heavily to the left. Google "BBC admits bias".

Would be fine for a private broadcaster, but a publicly-funded one must remain impartial.

Most Western media lean to the "left," meaning liberally biased and protective of horrible ideas like multiculturalism. And as soon as any outlet has the balls to show things the way they are they're branded as "extremist" and "right-wing." Take a look in the mirror, liberals and see who the real extremists are.

World's most inhumane? Search for "mass killings" or "mass murders" and you will see that non only Muslims are nowhere on the lists but if anything, they have mostly been the victims. Be informed before making such unfounded allegations.
